      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart(Board board,
                        java.lang.String gameDesc,
                        java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has started.

        Notifica que se ha iniciado un juego.

        Specified by:
        onGameStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        gameDesc - A string describing the currently played game.

        Un string que describe el juego al que se esta jugando.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are used to play the game (each piece belongs to a player).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizan para jugar a este juego (cada ficha pertenece a un jugador).

        turn - The piece to be played next.

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover.

      • onGameOver

        public void onGameOver(Board board,
                       Game.State state,
                       Piece winner)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has finished (with a winner, draw, or stopped).

        Notifica que ha terminado un juego (con un ganador, en tablas, o se ha interrumpido).

        Specified by:
        onGameOver in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        state - The state in which the game has finished.

        Estado en el que ha quedado el tablero.

        winner - The piece of the winner, if the game has finished with a winner, otherwise null.

        Ficha del ganador si el juego ha terminado con un ganador, o null en caso contrario.

      • onMoveStart

        public void onMoveStart(Board board,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a move is about to start executing.

        Notifica que va a iniciarse un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece to be played next (by the move).

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover a continuacion.

      • onMoveEnd

        public void onMoveEnd(Board board,
                      Piece turn,
                      boolean success)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that the execution of a move has finished.

        Notifica que ha terminado la realización de un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveEnd in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece that was supposed to be played by the move.

        Ficha a la que correspondia mover en el movimiento que acaba de terminar.

        success - true if the move has been executed successfully, otherwise false.

        true si el movimiento se ha realizado correctamente, false en caso contrario.
